sentence.Network_en: A mule is a hybrid of a male donkey and a female horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 骡子是公驴和母马交配而生的杂种动物。

sentence.Network_en: He's as stubborn as a mule .
I had fondly imagined that riding a mule would be easy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾经天真地以为骑骡子很容易.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 月份与星期的英文_百度文库 ... mustang 野马 mule 骡 ass,donkey 驴.
动物的象征意义_百度文库 ... 卑鄙的人驴子— ass — 愚笨迟钝的人骡子— mule — 秉性顽强的人母猪— sow —.
马字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 马路〖 road;avenue;street〗 马骡〖 mule〗 马马虎虎〖 caleless;casual〗.
mule skinner's delight 小钻杆mule 骡；牵引车mule's foot 驴蹄形绳结

list.abs: 钱骡（money mule）（Money mule）指通过因特网将用诈骗等不正当手段从一国得来的钱款和高价值货物转移到另一国的人，款物接收国通常是诈骗 …
cart的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... jack cart 起重机车 mule cart 四轮车 night cart 粪车.
mule skin 骡驹皮mule traveller 爬行吊机mule 轻便牵引机
SHOE_服装英语词典_服装英语_服装工业网 ... monk shoe 僧侣鞋 mule shoe 前密后开之拖鞋 open shoe 透空鞋(总称).

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mūl, probably of Germanic origin, from Latin mulus, mula; reinforced in Middle English by Old French mule

entry.def: A mule is an animal whose parents are a horse and a donkey.
A mule is a shoe or slipper which is open around the heel.

means.word_mean: 1. sterile offspring of a male donkey and a female horse
2. a slipper that has no fitting around the heel

list.explanation: 浓度高的、私酿和价廉的烈性酒，威士忌

example.en: Please don't serve me any of your gray mule.
example.zh: 请你别给我上你那自酿的威土忌了。

auth_sentence.content: Obstinate as a mule over that, he was.

sentences.en: The cart was pulled by two mules.
Anybody who believe there was any Santa Claus would believe a mule was a horse.
sentences.cn: 谁要是相信真的有圣诞老人，就会相信骡子是马。

sentences.en: She wore tight trousers and high-heeled mules.
sentences.cn: 她穿紧身裤和拖鞋式高跟鞋。

jushi.english: She wore tight trousers and high-heeled mules.
jushi.chinese: 她穿着紧身裤和高跟拖鞋。

jushi.english: A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey.
jushi.chinese: 骡子是母马和公驴的杂交种。
